name: Speed Car Racing -Police Chase
description:
Get ready to enter in furious Speed Car Racing -Police Chase, crash burn modified armored cars and face ruthless traffic in every tracks.

Fire missile use machine gun to destroy rivals racing cars and flip their ashes in the air.Jump behind AI controlled modified cars in this fast paced action packed game.

Drive in amazing city, desert and forest tracks race for the top position. Make way through traffic with your road warrior skills enjoy super addicting Speed Car Racing -Police Chase game ever. Master your perfect road warrior skills its race till death get killed or kill all to become ultimate winner.

Be careful from ground bombing and road mines, clear all obstacle to become unbeatable winner in this best car racing games.

Defeat ultimate fire missile and guns in this superb death race game. Unlock the hero inside you to clear all bounty missions in road killer simulation. Download Speed Car Racing -Police Chase: Speed Car Racing - Police Chase fast pace action and simulation game like not ordinary classic mode drag or normal rally racer.

Featuring:
4 fully weaponed custom furious racing cars for death race car games
3 breathtaking challenging racing missions with shooting scenario
Use accelerate speed up your racing cars
Battle against road warrior with heavy weapons guns and missiles
Vivid beautiful HD graphics for survival and Speed Car Racing -Police Chase game play
